mapper.select: SELECT i.inquery_id, i.inquery_title, i.inquery_detail, i.answer, i.status, i.inquery_date, i.answer_date, i.event_id, e.event_title, e.event_start_datetime, e.event_end_datetime FROM inqueries i JOIN events e ON i.event_id = e.event_id WHERE i.event_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY i.inquery_date DESC

SELECT i.inquery_id, i.inquery_title, i.inquery_detail, i.answer, i.status, i.inquery_date, i.answer_date, i.notice_id, e.notice_title, e.notice_date FROM inqueries i JOIN notices e ON i.notice_id = e.notice_id WHERE i.notice_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY i.inquery_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inqueries(inquery_detail, answer, status, inquery_date) VALUES (#{inqueryDetail}, #{answer}, #{status}, #{inqueryDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE inqueries SET answer = #{answer}, status = #{status}, answer_date = #{answerDate} WHERE inquery_id = #{inqueryId}
